Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.models.impl

Class ModelDataJsonConverter<T,I extends T>

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.models.impl.ModelDataJsonConverter<T,I>
Type Parameters:
T - The interface of the model to convert to and from.
I - A class implementing the interface T, which is necessary for Gson to create proper instances.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IModelStringConverter<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthTokenJsonConverter, SyncJobDataJsonConverter
public class ModelDataJsonConverter<T,I extends T> extends Object implements IModelStringConverter<T>
Convert IAuthTokenModel or ISettingsModel to and from String in JSON format.

This class uses Google's Gson library to convert to and from JSON.

    ModelDataJsonConverter(com.google.gson.Gson gson)
    Create a new model JSON converter utilizing Google's Gson library.

  • Method Details

    • decode

      public T decode(String encodedToken) throws RuntimeException
      Description copied from interface: IModelStringConverter
      Parses the provided String data and converts it to an instance of T.
      Specified by:
      decode in interface IModelStringConverter<T>
      Parameters:
      encodedToken - the encoded model data to parse.
      Returns:
      The extracted model data or null. In case parsing fail, then an exception of ParseException is thrown. In case the parameter encodedToken is an empty string or null, then null is returned.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • encode

      public String encode(T newAuthTokenData) throws RuntimeException
      Description copied from interface: IModelStringConverter
      Encodes an model to a String value.
      Specified by:
      encode in interface IModelStringConverter<T>
      Parameters:
      newAuthTokenData - new model data for sync with Smint.io API server, that need to be encoded.
      Returns:
      An encoded version of the token or null in case the provided parameter is null.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • getClassOfModel

      public Class<I> getClassOfModel()
      Return the class of the data model to be serialized - used for deserialization.
      Returns:
      the class instance of the model to deserialize - must not return null.

    • setClassOfModel

      protected ModelDataJsonConverter<T,I> setClassOfModel(Class<I> newModelClass)
      Return the class of the data model to be serialized - used for deserialization.
      Parameters:
      newModelClass - the new class type of deserialized data. This is needed by Google's Gson to know, which class to instantiate for the analysed json data.
      Returns:
      the class instance of the model to deserialize - must not return null.
